summary:
AfrosCompanionCave

-Adds 13 different Companions with pets to the game... (there will be more soon)
(look at the sreenshots)
-nearly every companion has his own working pet!
-most of them are marryable!

-Companion Cave with 
-Weapon Chamber
-merchant (Mr. J Greedy)
-blacksmith
-arena beta (v1.1)
descriptionHtml:
Adds 13 various companions to the game ...
(see screenshots)

Most of them are marryable!
Almost everyone has its own pets!
The pets can help fighting and follow their owners....




Companion cave with:

armory
Merchant (Mr. Greedy J)
blacksmith
(I still plan to the cave with other areas, such as an arena and a prison with torture-chamber to expand)
Room of Pain


Location of my cave:
Riverwood Sleeping Giant

Changelog 
V1.1:
Added Mr.J.Greedy as companion...he can trade and sell items everywhere you want...and hes is realy greedy...

Added room \"the Arena\" (but its beta.....so you need the \"Betakey\"^^ (you will find it)
small bugfixes

V1.2beta:

-adds a \"Play Song-Mode\" to all companions... (In this version its only one Song but this will be updated... [There are my own songs... i hope you like it])
- Adds the \"Room of Pain\" (still beta but funny^^)
and small bugfixes




Attention!
The mod should work as well with no other mods {exept Apachiis Hairmod....you need it] but I recommend everyone to install the following mods: (Just looks a lot better)

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
or
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set -Work In Progress- by Killer Keo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654


If any problems occur simply writes to me and I\'ll try as soon as possible to correct the error.
If you like my mod you can of course say that too ^ ^

Have fun with my mod! (If you like it please endorse me...)

(sorry for my english guys)

Sorry for the censorship...guys now its free for all 





Deutsche Beschreibung:

Fügt 12 verschiedene Gefährten ins  Spiel ein ... (ich habe noch vor weitere Charaktere einzubauen... bzw. den vorhandenen charakteren mehr Funktionen zu geben...)
(siehe Sreenshots)

Fast jeder Begleiter hat ein eigenes Haustiere!
Die meisten von ihnen kann man heiraten!

Companion-Höhle mit:

Waffenkammer
Händler (Mr. Greedy J)
Schmied
(Ich plane die Höhle noch mit weiteren Räumen wie einer Arena und einem Gefängnis zu erweitern)

Die Höhle befindet sich in der Kneipe zum schlafenden Riesen in Flusswald



Achtung!
Der Mod dürfte zwar auch ohne andere Mods funktionieren aber ich empfehle jeden folgende mods zu installieren: (Sieht einfach sehr viel besser aus)

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set -Work In Progress- by Killer Keo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

Wenn irgendwelche Fehler auftreten schreibt mich einfach an und ich werde sobald wie möglich versuchen den fehler zu beheben.
Wenn euch mein Mod gefällt könnt ihr das natürlich auch sagen^^

Viel Spaß mit meinem Mod!!!
author: Afroman888
